item.description:
Update: I called the restaurant and they are know we are coming. However they said they will only be ready at 12:15. 

---------------------------

We'll be meeting at The Maharaja in Harvard Square to discuss comics over some great Indian food. There's no set agenda, but the conversation will be thick with comic references :) If there's interest, we can walk over to one of the nearby comic book stores for a browse after lunch.

 

Please bring cash so that it makes bill splitting easier (no credit cards). Also, there is a 15 person limit for this meetup, so please change your RSVP if you can no longer make it to open your space for someone else. 

 

We look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: We look like our pictures and will likely have some comic books with us.
item.name: Comic book lunch!
